text: The Cuban peso is the only national currency in Cuba. On 1 January 2021, it became the only national currency when Cuban convertible peso was no longer in effect. Cuba to End Dual Currency System in 2021 Amid Crisis Reform The peso range from $1, $3, $5, $10, $20, $50, $100, $200 and $500.Cuba new 200-, 500-, and 1,000-peso notes to be issued 01.02.2015 BanknoteNews.com. January 16, 2015. Retrieved on 2015-01-17.Cuba new 200-, 500-, and 1,000-peso notes confirmed BanknoteNews.com. February 15, 2015. Retrieved on 2015-02-16. ==References== Category:Currency of North America Category:Cuba
title: Cuban peso
